testcase.name: shouldSelectAllWithoutParams()

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: <SELECT i.item_id, i.name, i.spec, i.unit, i.price, i.create_date, s.name AS supplierName, p.leadtime FROM item i JOIN plan p ON p.item_id = i.item_id JOIN supplier s ON s.sup_id = p.sup_id ORDER BY i.name ASC> but was: <SELECT i.item_id as itemId, i.item_code, i.name, i.spec, i.unit, i.price, i.create_date as createDate, p.leadtime FROM item i JOIN plan p ON p.item_id = i.item_id ORDER BY i.name ASC>

testcase.failure: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: <SELECT i.item_id, i.name, i.spec, i.unit, i.price, i.create_date, s.name AS supplierName, p.leadtime FROM item i JOIN plan p ON p.item_id = i.item_id JOIN supplier s ON s.sup_id = p.sup_id ORDER BY i.name ASC> but was: <SELECT i.item_id as itemId, i.item_code, i.name, i.spec, i.unit, i.price, i.create_date as createDate, p.leadtime FROM item i JOIN plan p ON p.item_id = i.item_id ORDER BY i.name ASC> at app//org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertionFailureBuilder.build(AssertionFailureBuilder.java:151) at app//org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertionFailureBuilder.buildAndThrow(AssertionFailureBuilder.java:132) at app//org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertEquals.failNotEqual(AssertEquals.java:197) at app//org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertEquals.assertEquals(AssertEquals.java:182) at app//org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertEquals.assertEquals(AssertEquals.java:177) at app//org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals(Assertions.java:1145) at app//com.erp.mes.sqlBuilder.ItemBuilderTest.shouldSelectAllWithoutParams(ItemBuilderTest.java:32) at java.base@17.0.12/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:569) at java.base@17.0.12/java.util.ArrayList.forEach(ArrayList.java:1511) at java.base@17.0.12/java.util.ArrayList.forEach(ArrayList.java:1511)

testcase.name: shouldLimitToItemId()

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: <SELECT i.item_id, i.name, i.spec, i.unit, i.price, i.create_date, s.name AS supplierName, p.leadtime FROM item i JOIN plan p ON p.item_id = i.item_id JOIN supplier s ON s.sup_id = p.sup_id WHERE (i.item_id = #{itemId}) ORDER BY i.name ASC> but was: <SELECT i.item_id as itemId, i.item_code, i.name, i.spec, i.unit, i.price, i.create_date as createDate, p.leadtime FROM item i JOIN plan p ON p.item_id = i.item_id WHERE (i.item_id = #{itemId}) ORDER BY i.name ASC>

testcase.failure: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: <SELECT i.item_id, i.name, i.spec, i.unit, i.price, i.create_date, s.name AS supplierName, p.leadtime FROM item i JOIN plan p ON p.item_id = i.item_id JOIN supplier s ON s.sup_id = p.sup_id WHERE (i.item_id = #{itemId}) ORDER BY i.name ASC> but was: <SELECT i.item_id as itemId, i.item_code, i.name, i.spec, i.unit, i.price, i.create_date as createDate, p.leadtime FROM item i JOIN plan p ON p.item_id = i.item_id WHERE (i.item_id = #{itemId}) ORDER BY i.name ASC> at app//org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertionFailureBuilder.build(AssertionFailureBuilder.java:151) at app//org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertionFailureBuilder.buildAndThrow(AssertionFailureBuilder.java:132) at app//org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertEquals.failNotEqual(AssertEquals.java:197) at app//org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertEquals.assertEquals(AssertEquals.java:182) at app//org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertEquals.assertEquals(AssertEquals.java:177) at app//org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals(Assertions.java:1145) at app//com.erp.mes.sqlBuilder.ItemBuilderTest.shouldLimitToItemId(ItemBuilderTest.java:48) at java.base@17.0.12/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:569) at java.base@17.0.12/java.util.ArrayList.forEach(ArrayList.java:1511) at java.base@17.0.12/java.util.ArrayList.forEach(ArrayList.java:1511)

testcase.name: shouldLimitToKeyword()

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: <SELECT i.item_id, i.name, i.spec, i.unit, i.price, i.create_date, s.name AS supplierName, p.leadtime FROM item i JOIN plan p ON p.item_id = i.item_id JOIN supplier s ON s.sup_id = p.sup_id WHERE (i.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) ORDER BY i.name ASC> but was: <SELECT i.item_id as itemId, i.item_code, i.name, i.spec, i.unit, i.price, i.create_date as createDate, p.leadtime FROM item i JOIN plan p ON p.item_id = i.item_id WHERE (i.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) ORDER BY i.name ASC>
